functional_requirements.description: System shall enable customers to view available items
functional_requirements.acceptance_criteria: Customer can see item catalog without authentication
Registered customers can initiate purchases for selected items
Customers can finalize purchases after payment selection

functional_requirements.description: System shall allow new customers to register accounts
functional_requirements.acceptance_criteria: Registration option available for unauthenticated users

functional_requirements.description: System shall integrate with credit card and PayPal payment gateways

functional_requirements.acceptance_criteria: Login mechanism available for registered users

functional_requirements.description: System shall integrate with external identity providers
functional_requirements.acceptance_criteria: Authentication service can delegate to external identity providers

non_functional_requirements.description: System shall implement secure authentication mechanisms
Payment gateways shall maintain transaction integrity
